name: Tour de Europe
overview: An avoid-it style game from the Italian publisher, LVC. The game was released in 1986. Run across the screen, avoiding all the items (like teapots, wrenches, pots, scissors, spiders, glasses and even a thermos!) falling from the sky and pick up the bags and return them to your side of the screen to gain points. When you get enough bags across you proceed to a new country and background. Make your way across the continent on your tour de Europe.
